name: Ahmad Hanafi - Electrical Engineering
description:
Electrical Engineering graduate from Politeknik Negeri Semarang with a focus on industrial electrical systems and automation. Possess a fundamental understanding of industrial power distribution, electrical equipment, and electrical systems used in plant environments.

Familiar with industrial control and automation systems such as PLC and HMI, and have a systematic working approach that prioritizes safety, system reliability, and compliance with industrial procedures in process industries.
